causalgraph.common.notebook#

A module to run experiments with the causalgraph package, and simplify the process of loading and saving experiments in notebooks.

Example:

>> from causalgraph.common.notebook import Experiment >> experiment = Experiment(“linear”, csv_filename=”linear.csv”) >> rex = experiment.load()

  1. 2023, 2024 J. Renero

Classes

BaseExperiment(input_path, output_path[, ...])

Base class for experiments.

Experiment(experiment_name[, csv_filename, ...])

Represents an experiment for causal graph analysis.
